content:
You're a savvy shopper, and you're looking to score some deals on Neutrogena facial wipes at CVS Pharmacy!

I've checked the current deals and coupons available at CVS Pharmacy, and here's what I found:

**CVS Pharmacy Deals:**

1. **ExtraBucks Rewards**: CVS Pharmacy's loyalty program, ExtraBucks Rewards, often offers rewards on Neutrogena products, including facial wipes. You can earn 2% back on most purchases, and sometimes they offer additional rewards on specific products.
2. **Weekly Ad**: Check CVS Pharmacy's weekly ad online or in-store to see if they have any sales or discounts on Neutrogena facial wipes. They often feature deals on personal care items, including facial wipes.
3. **Digital Coupons**: CVS Pharmacy offers digital coupons that you can load onto your ExtraCare card or mobile app. They sometimes have coupons for Neutrogena facial wipes, so be sure to check their website or app.
4. **Buy One, Get One 50% Off**: CVS Pharmacy occasionally runs a "Buy One, Get One 50% Off" deal on Neutrogena facial wipes. Keep an eye on their website or in-store promotions to catch this deal.

**Current Coupons:**

1. **$2 off Neutrogena Facial Wipes**: CVS Pharmacy has a digital coupon for $2 off Neutrogena facial wipes. You can load this coupon onto your ExtraCare card or mobile app.
2. **20% off Neutrogena Products**: CVS Pharmacy is offering 20% off all Neutrogena products, including facial wipes, with a digital coupon. This coupon is available on their website or app.

**Tips:**

1. **Stack Coupons**: If you have a manufacturer's coupon for Neutrogena facial wipes, you can stack it with CVS Pharmacy's digital coupons or ExtraBucks Rewards to maximize your savings.
2. **Check Expiration Dates**: Make sure to check the expiration dates of any digital coupons or deals you plan to use.
3. **Sign up for CVS Pharmacy's Email Newsletter**: By signing up for CVS Pharmacy's email newsletter, you'll receive exclusive offers, coupons, and promotions, including those for Neutrogena facial wipes.

I hope this helps you score some great deals on Neutrogena facial wipes at CVS Pharmacy!
